medical_history.chief_complaint: Mild right lower quadrant pain and constipation
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one week ago, with ongoing right lower quadrant discomfort, bloating, and cramping pain. The patient has had a worse appetite than usual and tried bowel medications that did not significantly improve his constipation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Plantar fasciitis, right carpal tunnel. No past surgical history.
medical_history.family_history: Father with possible prostate cancer; mother with coronary artery disease (CAD).
